room_title: Escape room "Murder in Marylebone" by Escape Hunt in Houston
review: This was sooo much fun being a detective. You have to try it!

room_title: Escape room "Murder in Marylebone" by Escape Hunt in Houston
review: This was our first time doing an escape room and we loved every minute of it. The owners and Da'Monique were extremely nice and made our experience even better. We didn't solve the murder mystery but still has a blast trying to! Will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Murder in Marylebone" by Escape Hunt in Houston
review: My daughter, her friend and I did the Murder room and we had everything we needed, except for about 2 more minutes! We were so close! It was my first time. It was a lot of fun! The hosts were absolutely awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Murder in Marylebone" by Escape Hunt in Houston
review: Had a great time here today with three wife and kids. We did the murder mystery first, but we liked it so much that we did the second mystery as well. Look forward to the Apollo mission game coming soon.

room_title: Escape room "Murder in Marylebone" by Escape Hunt in Houston
review: I went here with some fiends for my birthday. We had never done one of these rooms before and we had such a good time in the murder room. We were nervous because most don't make it out but for our group the puzzles were not impossible to figure out, but could take longer for some then others. Mark our game master gave great clues and we almost made it out, I mean we just needed another minute or two. Very dramatic. It leaves you wanting more. I liked that we could sit and talk for a few minutes after in the lounge and weren't rushed out and our game master stayed and visited with us. The owner who I met before we went in, greeted us when we came out too. I can tell it's important to her that her rooms are historically accurate, and she was very kind and friendly. Can't wait to come back!
